text:
I’ve recently listed a Data Scientist/R Developer role for my company, Red Oak Strategic, on Indeed. The role will be helping me maintain our political analytics pipelines/reports and the full job description can be found at <https://www.indeed.com/job/data-scientist-r-developer-647260bbe377857f|this link>. I am one of the hiring managers so I can answer questions if you have any. Our clients range from political campaigns to committees to PACs.

We are looking for an R person with 2-5 years experience, not an entry level position, we need someone who can get up to speed quickly and contribute to the existing code base fairly immediately. The post says our ideal candidate is local to DC, but we’ll consider remote candidates based on their R experience.
